name: Buffalo and Egret
description:
Desktop only

Buffalo LOVES to run, but little nasty ticks really annoy him.

Egret LOVES to eat, but isn't very good at hunting.

One day they met, and everything become so clear. Buffalo became running machine with nothing on his way (exept trees).  Egret became eating machine on the back of the buffalo. They became STRONGER TOGETHER!

Controls:

Buffalo: A / D or right / left arrows 

Egret: Mouse - egret is following your cursor.

Your goal is to collect as many Flyes as you can while staying alive. 

 If you run into a tree as Buffalo - you will lose. Evade the trees to stay alive. 

If 10 or more ticks will spawn on the buffalo - you will lose. Place and hold Egret on Buffalo to lower ticks. 

If Egret's hunger will be 10 or more - you will lose. To feed Egret collect Flyes by moving mouse cursor on them.

Music: https://www.bensound.com/

Trees and ground - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/low-poly-wind-182586

Sky - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/simple-sky-cartoon-assets-42373
